import React from 'react'; function About(props) { return (
{/* **********ABOUT US*******/}

About Us

We're a highly skilled and motivated team of creative people who
have been designing, developing, maintaining and hosting
websites and web applications for the businesses of Essex, London
and beyond for more than 21 years.

Beginning life as a start-up business providing web design in Essex, a passion for design and the internet has helped develop Enovate into a successful agency based on the strength of our work and the professional way we engage with our clients.
We're proud of the reputation we've built and the relationships we've developed with our customers, some of which have been with us for over five years or more, and they see us as an integral part of how their business is represented both online and offline.
); } export default About;
